description: Already warned by Derek about Lucass deceitfulness, Michel Mattel arrives at Lucass apartment. Lucas cuts Mattels salary in half too, but Mattel accepts it and suggests they practice for the big scene theyre supposed to shoot tomorrow, the grand finale of the film-within-a-film. (The two of them have already shot the films expensive cover art.) Cock-hungry Mattel happily takes Lucass long pole all the way up his lily-white ass. But while Lucas is sleeping, Mattel takes off with his money. In the end, the underhanded director gets what he deserves.
title: Michael Lucas and Michel Mattel
